org.ensembl.driver
Interface Driver

All Superinterfaces:
CoreDriver, EnsemblDriver
Deprecated. Deprecated in version 29.2, use org.ensembl.driver.CoreDriver instead.

public interface Driver
extends CoreDriver

A compatibility interface that allows legacy user code to work unmodified even though Driver had been replaced by CoreDriver.

Author:
Craig Melsopp
